title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, pull, push, and manage models with a simple async/sync API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama: works in Node, Bun, Deno, and browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration: use Ollama models as LLMs, embeddings, and chat endpoints in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: chat interface, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoint.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama: autocomplete, syntax highlighting, conversation history, and plugins.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension: bring local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template: ingest PDFs, index with Chroma, and chat over documents using Ollama embeddings.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration: OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for building production-grade pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama: fluent builder API, reactive streams, Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for Ollama: GPU node selection, PVC model cache, ingress, autoscaling.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot template: Ollama backend, Vercel deploy, file upload, shareable conversation links.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama: strongly-typed models, Dependency-Injection friendly, streaming IAsyncEnumerable.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin: run local LLMs on your notes—summarize, rewrite, translate, or Q&A inside vault.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim client for Ollama: async HTTP, static binaries, zero dependencies, Nimble package.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama: tokio-based async, serde models, examples for chat & embed, no unsafe code.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot: slash commands, thread-based chats, mod tools, GPU queue management.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app: mention the bot for local LLM answers, ephemeral threads, file snippet support.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir OTP library: GenServer client, telemetry events, Finch HTTP2, LiveView chat example.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package: management commands to pull/serve models, REST chat endpoint, admin integration.
